1.title: Pilot

episode of.title: Tales of the Lockwood Sisters (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

1.plot: Younger sister Najja Lockwood is graduating high school and ready to start college. Her older sister Dylan Lockwood-Smith is running late held up at the OB-GYN to get a checkup. Meanwhile her middle sister Sage Lockwood is miss the whole ceremony while getting fired from her job and later getting arrested for it. What a great way to the Lockwood sisters

2.title: Moving In, Moving Out

episode of.title: Tales of the Lockwood Sisters (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

2.plot: Najja moves into her dorm and meets her new roommate who takes her to a party where she behaves like she's never done before. Meanwhile Dylan drops in on her husband Marcus at work and stirs up trust issues because he hasn't been home lately. Also, Dylan finally bails Sage out of jail and she comes home to an eviction notice to move out and she does what she knows best to get that handled.

3.title: Secrets and Blackmail

episode of.title: Tales of the Lockwood Sisters (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

3.plot: Marcus comes home the next morning after being all day and night and Dylan is very upset about it. Meanwhile Najja is upset from embarrassing herself in front of Kyle, the frat boy she met at the party. Finally Najja catches Marcus in his office late with one of his students Alana. Najja doesn't hesitate to warn her Dylan. Also, Sage finally gets the dancing opportunity she's been waiting for.

4.title: Sleepwalker

episode of.title: Tales of the Lockwood Sisters (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

4.plot: Dylan confronts Marcus about what Najja told her and reveals something that shocks him. Najja returns the dorms with no memory of leaving in the first place, she's starting to lose track of time. Also, she and Cassie go to another party then end with her and Kyle back at his apartment. Meanwhile Sage tells Dylan that she's one of Blaze's dancing in his music video.

5.title: Cut If Off

episode of.title: Tales of the Lockwood Sisters (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

5.plot: Najja confronts Kyle about them sleeping together because she doesn't remember it happening. Marcus talks to his TA, Charles, about how his wife if pregnant and don't know how. Later on he reveals a secret to her that causes her more stress. Sage shoots Blaze music video but has to leave because Dylan ends up in the hospital.

6.title: Domestic Love

episode of.title: Tales of the Lockwood Sisters (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

6.plot: Sage comes home to change before she goes back to Dylan's house and Andre is there waiting for her very upset which leads to him putting his hands on her. Meanwhile the sister come together to be there for Dylan and Najja ends up revealing her secret and found out something her sister has been hiding from her for a long time.

7.title: Deadly Dinner Part 1

episode of.title: Tales of the Lockwood Sisters (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

7.plot: Najja ends up getting into it with her roommate and she forces her to move out. Meanwhile the family comes together for a dinner to find out the truth about everything. More people come than invited and more secrets are revealed.

8.title: Deadly Dinner Part 2

episode of.title: Tales of the Lockwood Sisters (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

8.plot: The family is disturbed from Sage's guest and is all fighting. Meanwhile, Marcus has another secret up his sleeve that is revealed which lead to someone getting shot.

imdb.plot outline: Three sisters that could have everything they could ever ask for. Family, Love, and money. But when the past catches up to you there's no hiding from it. Once all the secrets and lies come out who will be the last one standing from the betrayal?
imdb.title: Tales of the Lockwood Sisters
